summary: This document contains email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team. The emails discuss scheduling an appointment for the week of October 8, 2013, when Epstein is expected to return to New York City.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas and is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the bank's team.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is involved in the communication regarding scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Paul Data
persons.context: Paul Data is mentioned as a member of the Deutsche Bank team who will be managing Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry is referenced as someone who informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for a meeting.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual for whom the meeting is being scheduled with the Deutsche Bank team.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.
Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are collaborating on scheduling a meeting with Epstein.
Paul Data is part of the Deutsche Bank team that will manage Epstein's accounts.
Harry provided information to Amanda Kirby regarding Epstein's request for a meeting.

events.title: Meeting Scheduling
events.description: Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff discuss scheduling a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein for the week of October 8, 2013.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th R, New York, NY, USA
keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a meeting for Jeffrey Epstein with the Deutsche Bank team.
The meeting is proposed for October 7 or 8, 2013.
Lesley Groff is involved in the communication regarding the meeting.
Paul Data is mentioned as part of the team managing Epstein's accounts.
Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for the meeting.
